question: Which city is hosting the 15th edition of "All India Meet of State Legal Services Authorities"?
explanation: The 15th edition of \"All India Meet of State Legal Services Authorities\" has started at Pravasi Bharatiya Kendra (PBK) in New Delhi from March 18, 2017 to review the work of legal services authorities across the country. The two-day event is organized by the National Legal Services Authority (NALSA) in collaboration with Delhi State Legal Services (DSLS).
